lead_paragraph: “I’m an African-American quarterback that scares people,” said the Panthers’ quarterback, a leading candidate for most valuable player.
snippet: “I’m an African-American quarterback that scares people,” said the Panthers’ quarterback, a leading candidate for most valuable player.

headline.main: Cam Newton Says Race Is on Critics’ Minds
headline.print_headline: Newton Says Race Is on Critics’ Minds

abstract: Carolina Panthers quarterback Cam Newton suggests that race likely played large factor in why he became lightning rod for public criticism.
